title: GET FIZZ THE F*** OFF URF
body: this champion is so fucking dumb and so stupidly fucking broken on this gametype the moment the enemy team get a fizz you just lose straight away its not fun at all PLEASE disable him on urf its a joke sick of playing against him and getting stomped game after game GET A GRIP RIOT HOLY

replies.body: Sooooo no different than the normal game then?

I can agree riot is so dumb they cant even make a game mode fun why dont they just go back to the normal urf where you have a choice they ruin the game they think theyre so good but they are so fucking bad i could make a better game by fucking miles. What are they doing? just release normal urf the one that everyone likes and not this bull%%%% shitty snowdown fuckfest.

Then do it.
Fuck off and make your own game then.
